Literature.Title: A Novel Lipopeptaibol Emericellipsin A with Antimicrobial and Antitumor Activity Produced by the Extremophilic Fungus Emericellopsis alkalina.
Literature.Author: Rogozhin EA, Sadykova VS, Baranova AA, Vasilchenko AS, Lushpa VA, Mineev KS, Georgieva ML, Kul'ko AB, Krasheninnikov ME, Lyundup AV, Vasilchenko AV, Andreev YA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MG1655(MIC=>300µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>300µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>300µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14893(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 209P(MIC=4µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes EGDe(MIC=32.5µg/ml),Candida tropicalis(MIC=2µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=2µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 14053(MIC=2µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 16404(MIC=4µg/ml),Aspergillus niger(MIC=4µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus(MIC=4µg/ml),Aspergillus flavus(MIC=4µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(EC50=2.8µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(EC50=<0.5µM)
